BBEX3.A.RON.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Romania / USD 1 = RON ... (middle)
General: Currency conversion with effect from 1 July 2005: ROL (lei / singular: leu) 10,000 = RON 1 ((new) leu).
Source: Banca Nationala a Romaniei, Bucharest
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of daily rates.

Comment on 2005: Currency conversion with effect from 1 July 2005: ROL (lei / singular: leu) 10,000 = RON 1 ((new) leu); the exchange rates calculated between January and June 2005 were included in the calculation at this rate.
